headline: Denmark Snubs U.S. in $9 Billion Missile Deal, Turns to Europe
summary: Copenhagen's biggest-ever defense order deepens NATO's pivot as tensions with Russia and Trump reshape procurement.

headline: Curtiss-Wright Rewards Shareholders with $200M Repurchase Program Boost
summary: CW expands its 2025 buyback program by $200M, lifting expected repurchases to more than $450M for the year.

raw.headline: Curtiss-Wright Rewards Shareholders with $200M Repurchase Program Boost
raw.summary: CW expands its 2025 buyback program by $200M, lifting expected repurchases to more than $450M for the year.

headline: S&P 500's Howmet Aerospace Actionable Above This Level. It's the IBD Stock Of The Day.
summary: Howmet Aerospace is actionable above the 50-day line and nearing a base buy point. The IBD Stock Of The Day is up about 70% in 2025.

headline: Military Drones Could Be Defense Industry’s Big Bubble, Rheinmetall’s CEO Says
summary: EXCLUSIVE: Military drones are a crucial part of war in Ukraine and are rapidly expanding, but Armin Papperger is not convinced by their market foundations.
